title: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Pericom Semiconductor Corp.
text:
NEW YORK , Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Harwood Feffer LLP ( www.hfesq.com ) is investigating potential claims against the board of directors of Pericom Semiconductor Corp. ("Pericom" or the "Company") (NASDAQ: PSEM) concerning the proposed acquisition of the Company by Diodes Incorporated ("Diodes") (NASDAQ: DIOD).
Pericom designs, manufactures, and markets high-performance digital, analog, and mixed-signal integrated circuits; and frequency control products used in electronic systems worldwide.
Under the terms of the proposed merger, each share of Pericom will be converted into the right to receive $17.00 in cash, without interest. The aggregate value of the transaction is approximately $400 million . The boards of both companies have approved the transaction, which is still subject to approval by Pericom's shareholders, as well as other customary closing conditions and regulatory approvals.
Our investigation concerns whether the Pericom board of directors is fulfilling its fiduciary duties, maximizing the value of the Company, disclosing all material benefits and costs, and obtaining full and fair consideration for Company stockholders.
